column1: Báguanos (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈbaɣwanos]) is a municipality and town in the Holguín Province of Cuba.
Located in the middle of the province
column2: Báguanos is 34 kilometres (21 mi) far from Holguín and 52 kilometres (32 mi) from Banes. The municipal territory includes several villages: the most populated one is Tacajó
the municipality of Báguanos had a population of 54
column3: 854.  With a total area of 806 km2 (311 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 65.6/km2 (170/sq mi).
